text: hey broadway team, let me know if there's anything I can assist with today. The Droga team has the day off, so it should be a pretty quiet external day.

I've been chatting with Michael and testing on some older phones here, the UI style issues affecting pre-L devices are now resolved, and I added a command line option to the crosswalk config that should allow it to access media files stored locally

I'm about to wrap up for today and Michael is good to go for the rest of the afternoon... we're hoping for some design direction early next week so we know whether the "recording" UI state elements are going to be native or part of the web content.
Other than that, my next plan is to implement the loading screen and other framework screens
cool cool Ben will be back by then to ensure I don't mess up his master plans
sounds great from a today standpoint
